name: Block-Chain Express: One Link's Journey
description:
Built for the 9th Jame Gam Game Jam in relatively 20ish hours of work. An ambitious undertaking of a wacky physics driven character, Block-Chain Express: One Link's Journey has only 3 levels, and showcases what we hope are enjoyable linking mechanics that would be a blast to explore more in depth.

We unfortunately could not make our WebGL version work, the download and unzipping is quick though if you have the time. Please enjoy!

Unity Assets Used:
Colossal Game Music Collection
Low Poly Pack - Environment Lite
LowPoly Rocks
Polaris - Low Poly Ecosystem
QuickOutline
Low Poly Tree Pack
